testcase.classname: Automate the testing of an e-commerce website main functionalities
testcase.name: Search for dining tables
testcase.system-out: Given the user navigates to the e-commerce website homepage.................passed When the user locates the search bar and inputs the search query "Dining Tables".passed Then the search results page should load successfully.......................passed And the search results should contain items relevant to the search query....passed
